label: 荘園公領制(荘園国衙領制)
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
見出し読み: しょうえんこうりょうせい(しょうえんこくがりょうせい)
説明文: the medieval landholding system, comprising both estates and the provincial domain
